definitions.definition: A group of riders formed during a cycling road race ; especially, the main group of riders; the pack .
Synonym of platoon ( “ a small group of soldiers ” ) or section ( cognate with the former; not invariably synonymous with it, depending on century of use ) .

main_definition: ( cycle racing ) A group of riders formed during a cycling road race ; especially, the main group of riders; the pack .
secondary_definitions: ( military , chiefly historical ) Synonym of platoon ( “ a small group of soldiers ” ) or section ( cognate with the former; not invariably synonymous with it, depending on century of use ) .
